Perubahan Tarif Tol Jakarta-Tangerang Berlaku Mulai Hari Ini
02 Nov 2019, 00:51 by Bisnis.com, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Tarif tol baru Jakarta-Tangerang dan Tol Tangerang-Merak Segmen Simpang Susun Tomang-Tengerang Barat-Cikupa resmi disesuaikan dan diberlakukan hari ini, Sabtu 2 November 2019.
"Penyesuaian resmi diberlakukan per 2 November 2019. Ini sesuai dengan Keputusan Menteri PUPR Nomor 874/KPTS/M/2019. Sosialisasi akan terus dilakukan melalui berbagai media seperti media cetak, online, elektronik, dan media luar ruang," ujar Marketing and Communication Department Head PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk. Regional JabodetabekJabar, Irra Susiyanti kepada Bisnis, Sabtu 2 November 2019.
Irra mengatakan, Kementerian Pekerjaan Umum dan Perumahan Rakyat bersama para pengelola ruas jalan tol tersebut yakni Jasa Marga dan PT Marga Mandalasakti, bersinergi dalam melakukan sosialisasi perubahan tarif tol itu kepada masyarakat.
Tarif tol untuk kendaraan golongan I yang melingkupi sedan, jip, pikap/truk kecil dan bus yang semula Rp7.000 naik menjadi Rp7.500. Tarif tol golongan II dan III yang meliputi truk dengan dua dan tiga gandar turun dari Rp 12.000 menjadi Rp11.500.
Adapun tarif tol untuk kendaraan golongan IV atau truk dengan empat gandar turun dari Rp16.000 menjadi Rp15.000. Terakhir, tarif tol kendaraan golongan V yang mencakup truk dengan lima gandar atau lebih juga turun dari Rp20.000 menjadi Rp15.000.
Pada hari pertama perubahan tarif tol Jakarta-Tangerang ini, Jasa Marga melakukan penambahan gardu dan pengoperasian mobile reader untuk mengurangi kepadatan kendaraan di gerbang tol. Selain itu, perbaikan sarana penunjang seperti scrapping filling overlay (SFO) dan perkerasan jalan, pengecatan jembatan, dan penataan lansekap dilakukan Jasa Marga.

Changes in the Jakarta-Tangerang Toll Road Tariff Apply Today
02 Nov 2019, 00:51 by Bisnis.com, Rahma Tri
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The tariffs for the new Jakarta-Tangerang toll road and the Tangerang-Merak toll road in the Tomang-Tengerang Barat-Cikupa Simpang Susun segment are officially adjusted and implemented today, Saturday 2 November 2019.
"The official adjustment was made as of November 2, 2019. This is in accordance with Minister of PUPR Decree Number 874 / KPTS / M / 2019. Socialization will continue through various media such as print, online, electronic, and outdoor media," said the Marketing and Communication Department Head of PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk. Jabodetabek Regional, Jakarta, Irra Susiyanti to Bisnis, Saturday 2 November 2019.
Irra said, the Ministry of Public Works and Public Housing together with the managers of the toll roads, namely Jasa Marga and PT Marga Mandalasakti, synergized in conducting socialization of the toll tariff changes to the public.
Toll rates for class I vehicles which include sedans, jeeps, pickup / small trucks and buses, which were originally Rp7,000, have risen to Rp7,500. Tariffs for class II and III, which include trucks with two and three axles, went down from Rp 12,000 to Rp 11,500.
The toll rates for class IV vehicles or trucks with four axles decreased from IDR 16,000 to IDR 15,000. Finally, toll tariffs for class V vehicles which include trucks with five or more axles also dropped from Rp. 20,000 to Rp. 15,000.
On the first day of the Jakarta-Tangerang toll tariff change, Jasa Marga made additional substations and operated a mobile reader to reduce the density of vehicles at the toll gate. In addition, repair of supporting facilities such as scrapping filling overlay (SFO) and road pavement, bridge painting, and landscape management are carried out by Jasa Marga.
